verses.verse: <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H1824>don't<s%> keep silent. <S%H1824>Don't<s%> keep silent, and <S%H8252>don't<s%> be still, <S%H410>God.<s%>
<S%H341>For,<s%> behold, your enemies are <S%H1993>stirred<s%> <S%H8130>up.<s%> Those who hate you have lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H7218>heads.<s%>
They <S%H5475>conspire<s%> with <S%H6191>cunning<s%> against your <S%H5971>people.<s%> They <S%H3289>plot<s%> against your cherished <S%H6845>ones.<s%>
<S%H3212>"Come,<s%>" they <S%H559>say,<s%> "and <S%H3582>let<s%>'s destroy them as a <S%H1471>nation,<s%> that the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> may be remembered no <S%H2142>more.<s%>"
For they have <S%H3289>conspired<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> with one <S%H3820>mind.<s%> They <S%H3772>form<s%> an alliance against <S%H1285>you.<s%>
The <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> and the <S%H3459>Ishmaelites;<s%> <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and the <S%H1905>Hagrites;<s%>
<S%H804>Assyria<s%> also is <S%H3867>joined<s%> with <S%H2220>them.<s%> They have helped the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3876>Lot.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H6213>Do<s%> to them as you did to <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> as to <S%H5516>Sisera,<s%> as to <S%H2985>Jabin,<s%> at the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H7028>Kishon;<s%>
who <S%H8045>perished<s%> at <S%H5874>Endor,<s%> who became as <S%H1828>dung<s%> for the <S%H127>earth.<s%>
<S%H7896>Make<s%> their <S%H5081>nobles<s%> like <S%H6159>Oreb<s%> and <S%H2062>Zeeb;<s%> <S%H5257>yes,<s%> all their princes like <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna;<s%>
As the <S%H784>fire<s%> that <S%H1197>burns<s%> the <S%H3293>forest,<s%> as the <S%H3852>flame<s%> that <S%H3857>sets<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> on <S%H3857>fire,<s%>
so <S%H7291>pursue<s%> them with your <S%H5591>tempest,<s%> and <S%H926>terrify<s%> them with your <S%H5492>storm.<s%>
<S%H4390>Fill<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> with <S%H7036>confusion,<s%> that they may <S%H1245>seek<s%> your <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Let them be <S%H954>disappointed<s%> and <S%H926>dismayed<s%> <S%H5703>forever.<s%> <S%H2659>Yes,<s%> let them be confounded and <S%H6>perish;<s%>
that they may <S%H3045>know<s%> that you <S%H8034>alone,<s%> whose name is <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> are the Most <S%H5945>High<s%> over all the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
